website_summaries.verdict: Why give your cat generic “seafood” treats when you can spoil them with delicious high-protein, low-calorie, 100% real shrimp harvested straight from the ocean?
pros: One ingredient – wild caught freeze-dried shrimp
We like that the limited ingredients make a healthful treat for most diets

customer_reviews.title: Smelly but amazing
customer_reviews.text: My kitty is all about these mice. He could eat a whole package at once, in fact he stole a whole package and I didnt figure out until our room smelled like shrimp from the leftover packaging he didnt eat. It's very smelly but my kitty loves them, and they are healthy so I give him a hand full at a time. Now side note, other treats as $1-2 these are 3 sometimes 4 dollars. Also the value pack is the same size as a regular you can buy at walmart cheaper. Would recommend them lower the price here on amazon. Other than that I love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Rayna

customer_reviews.title: Artificially puffed
customer_reviews.text: I confused these (Puresnack) with the Purebites brand of freeze dried shrimp treats that my cats like. The packaging is suspiciously similar. But these are not the same. The little shrimps are weirdly puffed up and look artificial. The Purebites shrimps are real little shrimps dried. These look like they are made from some manufacturing process. I would have given 1 star but my cats like them just fine. So the flavor must be fine. I just don't like that they don't seem like real shrimp
customer_reviews.author: House Wife

customer_reviews.title: Cats go wild for them!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy these treats at the local pet store, but since they discontinued them I have been struggling to find an alternative that my cats love. These are amazing; my cats go wild for them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Good for kittens
customer_reviews.text: Not every cat likes these, but most kittens really seem to. The taurine in shrimp is SO important for brain development when they’re little. I’m sure these don’t get all the credit, but still, I have two very bright kitties to show for it haha.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M Frieling

customer_reviews.title: Cat loved them!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved them, however it’s a small bag, and she’s a great monster, so it didn’t last too long.
customer_reviews.author: kellie

customer_reviews.title: Cat's favorite treats
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty goes crazy over these treats! Best part is they are so much cheaper on Amazon then our local pet store, saved over half off!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Render

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats love the streets so much ! The vet said that they are much healthier than package treats because there’s only one ingredient , But my cats don’t know the difference and they get very excited about this so it must taste good!
customer_reviews.author: REcker

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My very picky cat loves these! Large pieces of shrimp. Easy for her to chew as she is 15 with some missing teeth. Good price for the amount. They have become a staple for my cat. Would buy larger bag if available!
customer_reviews.author: Dana J

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Good treats - just natural shrimp. My cats don’t like them though. Dogs on the other hand, love them. So mine won’t go to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Mason

customer_reviews.title: a treat my finicky cat loves
customer_reviews.text: Mt cat absolutely loves these treats.. I can shake the bag and no matter where she is in the house, she'll come running over.
customer_reviews.author: marie beckinger

customer_reviews.title: My cats love them.
customer_reviews.text: These things are like cat crack. My cats love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Drool-worthy kitty snacks
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these and drools when she sees me opening the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Zurah

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: This bag is only filled 1/4 of the way and is the biggest rip off for even the 3 bucks I paid for it Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Zakowski

customer_reviews.title: Freeze dried Cat treats.
customer_reviews.text: My Cat loves these treats. She likes the Shrimp and Salomon the best. She is very picky on what she eats and she loved these right from the start. I was buying them in Walmart but they don't have them any more so I am trying to find her some more.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN ZAMROK

product_meta.title: Puresnacks Shrimp Freeze-Dried Treats For Cats, 0.42Oz/12G | Value Size
product_meta.description: Go ahead, turn the bag around and look at the ingredients. PureSnacks are made with only 1 ingredient; 100% Pure Wild-Caught Shrimp. Cats love the taste of PureSnacks because our treats are freeze dried RAW to lock in the aroma, texture and freshness they crave. Cat parents love PureSnacks because our treats are 100% pure and rich in nutrients for a happy and healthy life.
feature_bullets: Made With Only 1 Ingredient; 100% Pure Wild-Caught Raw Shrimp.
Proudly Sourced From The Indian Ocean And Packaged In The Usa.
100% Natural, Pure And Easy To Digest Without Any Added Preservatives.
On Average 1 Calorie Per Treat And High In Protein.
Ideal For Cats With Health Issues Or Pets That Are Overweight, Diabetic, Have Allergies, Gastrointestinal Disorders, Or Are On A Restricted Diet.

Made Using A Delicate Freeze Drying Process That Preserves The Nutritional Integrity Of Raw Fresh Whole Food. Only Water Is Removed, Preserving All The Characteristics And Natural Nutrition Of Fresh Raw Shrimp.
